482690.name: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2: Cinna's Sketchbook: Secrets Of The Mockingjay Armor
482690.description: Costume Designers Kurt & Bart created not only the majestic Mockingjay battle armor for Katniss, but also a beautiful prop Cinna sketchbook used on film. Here, we present high-resolution pages from the sketchbook accompanied by insightful audio commentary that illuminates the artistry involved.
482690.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 原生支持 Steam 控制器
